high_descs: Walk to the right of the desk and turn around to face it.
Pick up the credit card to the left of the other credit card.
Walk to the side of the desk where the lamp is.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Look at a credit card by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: turn right to face the bed move forward turn left move forward toward the window turn left to face the dresser
pick up the blue card underneath the pencil
turn left move forward past the desk turn right move forward turn right again to face the lamp
turn the lamp on
anns.task_desc: to pick up a card and turn on the lamp

high_descs: Move towards the bedroom window then face the dresser
Pick up the credit card closest to the pencil
Head to the opposite end of the dresser while carrying the card
Turn on the lamp on top of the dresser
anns.task_desc: Carry a credit card while turning on a lamp on the dresser

high_descs: Walk to the credit cards on the right side of the dresser in front of you.
Pick up the credit card on the left.
Walk to the front of the lamp on the left side of the dresser.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, left and then left again so that you are facing the chest of drawers
Pick up a credit card from off of the drawers
Turn left and then quickly turn to your right twice so that you are facing the side of the drawers
Turn on the lap that is on the drawers
anns.task_desc: Pick up a credit card and turn on a lamp
